title: DiSSCo Controlled Value
description: A schema for defining individual controlled values used in openDS Terms.

@id.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the controlled value

@type.description: The type of the digital object

ods:fdoType.description: The DOI to the FDO type of the object

ods:status.description: The status of the Digital Object

ods:version.description: The version of the object, each change generates a new version. The version starts at 1 and each change will increment the version number with 1

ods:hasAgents.description: Contains all agents that are connected to the specimen. Agents that are part of a specific part of the specimen should be added there. For example, a Collector is connected to the CollectingEvent so is added in the event.

dcterms:title.description: The title of the controlled value

skos:definition.description: A concise definition of the controlled value

skos:inScheme.description: The PID of the Term (e.g. ods:topicDiscipline) this value belongs to

skos:broader.description: The broader controlled value in the hierarchy

owl:deprecated.description: Indicates whether the value is deprecated
